items.sentence: I want you to cook something different tonight.
I want you to take back what you said just now.
I want you to tell me everything that happened.
I wanted Mary to go out with me instead of Tom.
I live near the sea so I often go to the beach.
I put the documents you requested on your desk.
I thought we were supposed to meet Tom at 2:30.
First and foremost, I\'d like to thank you all.
My computer crashed and now it won\'t start up.
Tom knows there isn\'t much he can do about it.
Tom made no attempt to answer Mary\'s question.
Tom immigrated to Australia when he was thirty.
Tom is going to stay there as long as possible.
Tom is not as smart as he likes to think he is.
Tom is sitting on the sofa, reading a magazine.
Tom is someone I really enjoy hanging out with.
I\'ve learned to live with the pain in my back.
Put that knife down. You\'re making me nervous.
Tom jumped to his feet and ran out of the room.
Tom fell asleep on the bus and missed his stop.
Tom fell asleep on the couch while watching TV.
Tom felt very tired after sleeping for so long.
Tom filled the three glasses with orange juice.
Tom finally realized there was something wrong.
I haven\'t yet given Tom permission to do that.
I hear you\'ve all been pretty busy yourselves.
I heard Tom gave you his grandfather\'s violin.
I didn\'t know that you used to live in Boston.
I don\'t have any friends who can speak French.
I don\'t know whether Tom has a bicycle or not.
I don\'t remember exactly where I put the keys.
I don\'t want anyone wearing my clothes but me.
You\'ll get a lot of presents on your birthday.
You\'ll soon get used to living in the country.
You\'re going to need all the help you can get.
You\'re just not the person I thought you were.
Do you really want to go to Boston by yourself?
Do you really want to go to the party with Tom?
Do you remember the day this picture was taken?
Do you remember what Tom was wearing yesterday?
Do you think I can borrow your car next Monday?
Do you think I should tell my parents about us?
Tom is totally disgusted with Mary\'s behavior.
Tom isn\'t always in the office in the morning.
Tom isn\'t as young as most people think he is.
Who\'ll look after your cat while you are away?
Why don\'t we take some time to think about it?
Why don\'t you just ask your parents for money?
Tom had to pay damages to the owner of the car.
Tom had to wait for Mary for about three hours.
